campaigns.name: Rewards for Suppressing a Boss Enemy in PSO2:NGS
activityFull: Suppresion of the Boss Enemy Nogleth during the closed beta test operating period

campaigns.name: Campaign Reward for Using the Personal Shop in PSO2:NGS
activityFull: Sell and Purchase at least once on Personal Shop

campaigns.name: Reward for Reaching a Battle Power of 1,050 in PSO2:NGS
Campaign Rewards for Using the Material Storage in PSO2:NGS
activityFull: Deposit and Withdraw an item from Material Storage OR use Material Storage from Item Lab, Quick Food or Region Mag

campaigns.name: Survey Reward
activityFull: Complete the survey for closed beta tests

campaigns.name: Windows 10 and Xbox One Incentives!
campaigns.activityShort: Log in with Xbox / Microsoft Store
activityFull: Log in to PSO2 NEW GENESIS from Windows 10 or Xbox One during the campaign period

campaigns.name: Story Clear Campaign
activityFull: Achieving the Main Task “A Triumphant Report”

campaigns.name: Level-Up Campaign
activityFull: Achieve Class Level 10 with any Class
Achieve Class Level 20 with any Class

campaigns.name: Friend Request Campaign
activityFull: Players with at least 3 friends on their Friend List at the start of scheduled maintenance
Players with at least 7 friends on their Friend List at the start of scheduled maintenance

campaigns.name: Join an Alliance Campaign
activityFull: Join an Alliance with 4 or more members as of the start of maintenance
Join an Alliance with 8 or more members as of the start of maintenance

campaigns.name: AC Purchase Campaign
activityFull: Purchase a total of 500 AC or more

campaigns.name: My Battle Power Campaign
activityFull:
Follow @play_pso2 and tweet #MyBattlePower with a screenshot of your BP
(Raffle: 10 winners)

campaigns.name: PSO2:NGS x INTEL Collaboration Campaign
activityFull: Purchase a qualifying Intel processor or processor-based device

campaigns.name: Group Chat Campaign
activityFull: Say something in the Group Chat 3 times
Say something in the Group Chat 5 times

campaigns.name: Screenshot Submission Campaign
activityFull:
Follow @play_pso2 and tweet #PSO2NGS_SScampaign with a screenshot based on the theme "A New Universe"
(Raffle: 20 winners)

campaigns.name: Item Design Contest
activityFull:
Submit an outfit or accessory design image via the Support Form
(Contest: 20 winners)

campaigns.name: Stamp-Drawing Contest
activityFull:
Submit an outfit or accessory design image via the Support Form
(Contest: 20 winners)

campaigns.name: Web Link Panels
rewards: Increased Rare Drop Rate from Panel 5

campaigns.name: Limited-Time Daily and Weekly Tasks (Second Half)
